stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Command and Control Sites Observed
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: Between 4 March and 17 March 2015, the command and control (C2) domains www.getnewonlines.net and pics.toprivatespace.net were identified in communication with US Government systems.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
The first GET request occurred at 15:07 GMT on 4 March 2015 from a US Government IP address:
GET /default.asp?id=[7 DIGIT NUMBER] Host: www.getnewonlines.net

The second GET request occurred at 13:04 GMT on 12 March 2015 from a second US Government IP address:
GET /fri/default.asp?id=[7 DIGIT NUMBER] HTTP/1.1 Accept: image/png, image/svg+xml, image/*;q=0.8, */*;q=0.5 Accept-Language: en-US User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 9.0; Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/5.0) Host: www.getnewonlines.net Cache-Control: max-stale=0 X-BlueCoat-Via: a311f24ca838594a Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, identity Connection: Keep-Alive X-BlueCoat-Via: 4d080b0c5a99be0b
This request generated the following response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Date: Thu, 12 Mar 2015 13:01:34 GMT Server: Microsoft-IIS/6.0 Content-Length: 0 Content-Type: text/html Set-Cookie: ASPSESSIONIDSSBQBABQ=PGFHBHMANLJHHHODALJLPDDN; path=/ Cache-control: private

The third GET request occurred at 20:24 GMT on 17 March 2015 from a third US Government IP address:
GET /photos/group/20157736.php?id=[5 DIGIT NUMBER] HTTP/1.1 Accept: text/html, application/xhtml+xml, */* Accept-Language: en-US User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (compatible; MSIE 9.0; Windows NT 6.1; Trident/5.0) Host: pics.toprivatespace.net Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, identity Cache-Control: max-stale=0 Connection: Keep-Alive X-BlueCoat-Via: bcae3b80ca84e07e
That request generated the following response:
HTTP/1.1 302 Found Date: Mon, 16 Mar 2015 20:20:16 GMT Server: Apache/2.2.17 (Win32) PHP/5.3.5 X-Powered-By: PHP/5.3.5 Location: reload.php Content-Length: 0 Keep-Alive: timeout=5, max=100 Connection: Keep-Alive Content-Type: tex
